name: Best Breakfast Sausage Balls Ever
author: Raven
summary: These sausage balls have a secret ingredient not used in most recipes that makes them moist and delicious! They won't last long at your holiday party!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine sausage, baking mix, Cheddar cheese, egg, and evaporated milk in the bowl of a stand mixer; mix on low speed until thoroughly combined
Shape sausage mixture into 1-inch balls and arrange onto baking sheets
Bake in preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, 8 to 10 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
